data.message: Yes Eminem is the best legend but don't act like y'all don't be bumping drake shit..... He is a great entertainer regardless of whether he flosses a lifestyle you think he ain't about he is an entertainer and he entertains now you wanna shun him because he might have rap beef with Eminem...... If you not trying to be the best and go at the best then what the fuck you here for...... As a man I don't give a fuck how legend you are if you make comments in a negative fashion I'm gonna respond like a fucking man I ain't bowing down to fucking no one

replies.message: Oh i aint gone deny it i listen to drake he have some good songs
Go battle Eminem we'll see ya in hell bro :)
Nah drake is the most overrated pussy in the rap game. The dude ain’t got no talent
